snippet: CAIOLA--Bettina (Benedetta), a longtime resident of Pelham Manor, New York passed away on July 2, 2016 in her home surrounded by family. She was 83 years old. Bettina was predeceased by her husband Salvatore Caiola, patriarch of Bettina Equities M...
lead_paragraph: CAIOLA--Bettina (Benedetta), a longtime resident of Pelham Manor, New York passed away on July 2, 2016 in her home surrounded by family. She was 83 years old. Bettina was predeceased by her husband Salvatore Caiola, patriarch of Bettina Equities Management. She is survived by her children, Benny (Michele), Maria, and Rosemarie (Carl) and nine grandchildren, Gianna, Alexander, Salvatore, Marisa, Michael, Joey, Sofia, Carmelo and Benny. Mass will be held at Saints John & Paul Church, 280 Weaver Street, Larchmont, NY 10538, Thursday, July 7th at 10am. 1/3
